author: Staff Reporter
text:
Four persons entered into the house K. Jothimani (33) at Kanjikonampalayam near Vellalore on Monday afternoon, gagged her mouth and fled with four sovereign gold chain and a pair of silver anklets. The incident came to light only during the late hours of the day when the woman managed to get help.

It is learnt that her husband Karuppasamy had gone to work. The police quoted the victim as saying that they showed her a knife, forcibly took her into a room and committed the crime. Podanur Crime Police were conducting inquiries.
title: Woman robbed of jewellery
